amendment.description: To clarify that additional funds are not authorized to be appropriated to carry out the feasibility and suitability study.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5113 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5113 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S10539; text: CR S10539) To clarify that additional funds are not authorized to be appropriated to carry out the feasibility and suitability study.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5113 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5113 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
